data.name: Quadratic puzzle 1
data.detailed_description:
Game introduction

The gameplay is mainly jigsaw puzzles, and you can pass the level by moving all the animation image fragments to their original positions. In the upper left corner, the time of stitching the images will also be counted and each level will record the fastest time to complete the puzzle. Can challenge your fastest record.

Game Features

Each game level has a different style of anime pictures, and each level can be difficult to choose according to your own preferences. The higher the difficulty, the more fragments need to be spliced. When all the stitching is completed, you can also enter the visit mode, you can use the "W, A, S, D" keys to change the direction of the camera, and the mouse wheel controls the zoom, so that you can see any part you want to see!

data.short_description: "Quadratic puzzle 1" is a puzzle game developed by "black tanuki". The biggest feature of the game is that all the spliced pieces are irregular in shape, just like the puzzles sold in the toy store.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 7/8/10
  • Processor: i3 2700
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 480
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game has no adult content
